annotation_sentence: Weather is very hot these days.
rationale: 'These' is a quantifier used to refer to a specific group of days.
'Next' is a quantifier used to refer to the year following the current one.
'All' is a quantifier used to refer to the entirety of the family.

annotation_sentence: Uh, not much. Just busy with work and... how to say... family things.
rationale: 'Not much' is a quantifier used to indicate a small amount or degree.

annotation_sentence: Yes, I want see... um, new places. Your family all well, yes?
rationale: 'All' is a quantifier used to refer to the whole quantity or extent of a particular group.
